title: Differences Between C and C++
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
| C | C++ |
|---|---|
| Procedural | Multi-paradigm (OOP + Procedural) |
| No Function Overloading | Supports Function Overloading |
| No References | Supports References |
| top-down approach | bottom-up approach |

common_mistakes.mistake: Thinking C++ is just C with classes
common_mistakes.correction: It has Templates, Exceptions, Lambda, Stronger Type Checking.

interview_questions.question: Can C code run in C++ compiler?
interview_questions.answer: Mostly yes, C++ is largely backward compatible. But strict type checking might cause warnings.
